pages.text: The $(item)Soul Crystal$() is the key to summoning your AI companion. It stores the companion's soul and allows respawning after death.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(li)$(bold)Right-click$() on the ground to summon your companion.$(li)$(bold)Shift+right-click$() a block to set the companion's home position.$(li)If your companion dies, their inventory is preserved. Use the crystal again to respawn them with all their items.
